column2: We meet currently a problem to get products information using our API from S29. This error message appear: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Data.DataRow' to type 'Cdiscount.Entity.Product.Dao.BarcodeDao'. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to update offers by API from S28. This error message appears: Stock: Not enough stock compared to pending orders. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
